pageContent: Objective: While androgen deprivation therapy (ADT) has been associated with decreased quality of life (QoL), controlled prospective studies are lacking. We aimed to assess QoL during ADT using two validated questionnaires and determine contributing factors.

metaData.source:
[Management of side effects of endocrine treatment for prostate cancer]
